b1.text: You've reviewed any special disclosure that applies in your state: ME, CA, NY, RI, OH, VT and WI residents All information you've submitted is true and correct and is given to obtain credit from us Co-applicant (if any) has authorized you to submit this application on his or her behalf. You and co-applicant (if any) are of legal contracting age. Credit approval, Annual Percentage Rate (APR), and credit terms are based on our review of each applicant’s application information and credit report. You understand we collect your individual income information to determine your individual ability to pay. Examples may include income earned from your employment (salary, overtime, bonus), retirement/pension benefits, and rental properties. Student loans are not acceptable sources of income. Alimony, child support, or separate maintenance income need not be revealed if you don't wish it to be considered as a basis for repayment.
